mapper.select: select lb.LB_NO, LB_TITLE, LB_CONTENT, LB_INDATE, LR_NO, LR_STATUS, LR_INDATE, LR_STATUS, lb.U_NO, uv.u_nickname, ULM_LEVEL, ULM_ACCESS_COUNT, ULM_WRITE_COUNT, ULM_COMMENT_COUNT,ULM_ACCESS_TIME from LEVELUP_BOARD lb full join LEVELUP_RESULT_BOARD lrb on lb.LB_NO = lrb.LB_NO join USER_VIBEVILLAGE uv on lb.U_NO = uv.U_NO full join USER_LEVEL_MANAGEMENT ulm ON ulm.U_NO = uv.U_NO where LB_DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY LB_INDATE DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT LEVELUP_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into LEVELUP_BOARD (LB_NO, LB_TITLE, LB_CONTENT, LB_INDATE, LB_UPDATE, LB_DELETE, LB_DELETE_YN, U_NO) VALUES (#{levelUpDTO.lbNo}, #{levelUpDTO.lbTitle}, #{levelUpDTO.lbContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, 'N', #{uNo})
insert into LEVELUP_RESULT_BOARD (LR_NO, LR_STATUS, LR_INDATE, LB_NO, U_NO) values (LEVELUP_RESULT_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '진행중', SYSDATE, #{levelUpDTO.lbNo}, #{uNo})
mapper.select: select lr.LB_NO, LB_TITLE, LB_CONTENT, LB_INDATE, lr.U_NO, uv.u_nickname, LR_STATUS, ULM_LEVEL, ULM_ACCESS_COUNT, ULM_WRITE_COUNT, ULM_COMMENT_COUNT,ULM_ACCESS_TIME from LEVELUP_BOARD lr full join LEVELUP_RESULT_BOARD lrb on lr.LB_NO = lrb.LB_NO join USER_VIBEVILLAGE uv on lr.U_NO = uv.U_NO full join USER_LEVEL_MANAGEMENT ulm ON ulm.U_NO = uv.U_NO where lr.LB_NO = #{lbNo}
mapper.update: update LEVELUP_BOARD set LB_DELETE = default, LB_DELETE_YN = 'Y' where LB_NO = #{lbNo}
update USER_LEVEL_MANAGEMENT set ULM_LEVEL = CASE WHEN ULM_LEVEL = '가을' THEN '여름' WHEN ULM_LEVEL = '여름' THEN '봄' ELSE ULM_LEVEL END where U_NO = #{uNo}
update LEVELUP_RESULT_BOARD lrb set LR_STATUS = '완료', LR_INDATE = SYSDATE where LB_NO = #{lbNo}
update LEVELUP_RESULT_BOARD lrb set LR_STATUS = '반려', LR_INDATE = SYSDATE where LB_NO = #{levelUpDTO.lbNo}
